long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension to automatically hit the Jump To Recipe button on food and recipe websites that commonly have them, so you can skip all the unnecessary details and life stories that food bloggers put to improve their SEOs, and get straight to the point
This extension essentially scans the webpage for any links or buttons labelled "Jump To Recipe", and clicks it as soon as the page loads. That's it. It's as simple as that
